title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 326.2 - Selection of cases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 326.2 - Selection of cases

State Regulations
(a) Social services districts will be supplied monthly by the department with an
appropriate number or random case-number endings for active ADC, MA and
food-stamp cases. (b) Social
services districts will be supplied by the department, with a random start and
an appropriate interval for selection of the negative-action, ADC, MA or
food-stamp (non-public-assistance) cases. Negative-action cases are defined as
nonaccepted applications, withdrawals of applications and case
closings. (c) Each social services
district shall enter onto form DSS 1727 those cases falling within the sample
and shall submit a completed DSS 1727 to the department's bureau of audit
operations not later than the 10th day of the month of selection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
326.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
